name: video_url
label: Video URL
help_text: Add your MP4, YouTube or Vimeo video URL

name: keep_controls_on_screen_while_playing
label: Keep controls on screen while playing

name: video_category
label: Category
help_text: This is optional, only applicable along with listing sections, when using filtering. You can specify multiple categories separated by commas. Example: apple, orange, pear. Please try using one word with alpha-numeric characters only. You can separate multiple words with "_". Example: inbound_marketing. This is case sensitive, so use the same as in your Listing Menu. Example: you have #iPhone in your Listing Menu, it should be iPhone here, not iphone.

name: custom_class
label: Custom Class
help_text: A custom class that you can target in CSS to further style this module.
